title.rendered: Spandan Pro – Top selling 12 Lead ECG device in a wire

content.rendered:
Spandan Pro

Future of 12 Lead ECG Unleashed in a Cord

Shop Now
Book a Free Demo

FOR HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONALS

ECG with just a Cable

Spandan Pro is specifically designed for healthcare professionals. Spandan Pro condenses the capability of a large ECG machine into a small cable! With just this cable, you can conduct a medical-grade 12 Lead ECG on your smartphone. It is revolutionizing the delivery of cardiac care, ultimately leading to improved patient outcomes.

NO NEED TO CHANGE LEADS MANUALLY

Auto Switching Leads

Spandan Pro’s 10 chest leads switch automatically, removing the need for manual intervention. This not only reduces the time needed to take an ECG but also eliminates human errors in lead selection. These cutting-edge leads significantly expedite the ECG process, delivering the fastest 12 Lead ECG in just 1.3 minutes.

ENHANCED PATIENT MANAGEMENT

Instant Bedside ECG

Spandan Pro acts as an immediate bedside ECG, removing the necessity to transport patients to ECG rooms. This enables prompt bedside diagnostics, minimizing the physical strain and risk associated with moving patients, particularly those who are critical or immobile.

EARLY DIAGNOSTICS AND RISK ASSESSMENT

Preventive Cardiology

In preventive cardiology, Spandan Pro serves as a crucial bridge, offering tools for early diagnosis and risk assessment. Regular monitoring with Spandan can help in identifying patients at risk of developing cardiac conditions, facilitating early interventions and lifestyle adjustments to prevent serious health issues.

Preferred By​

Know When to Use Spandan

Unclear Symptoms

Find out immediately if your symptoms need to be treated or not.

Heart Attack

Avoid additional damage following a heart attack by performing regular checks.

Arrhythmias

Recognize recurrent symptoms after being treated for an arrhythmia and prevent stroke

Prevention

Keep your cardiac risk, whether from increasing age or a familial predisposition, in check.

How to take ECG with Spandan

Watch Full Video
Watch Full Video

Access Medical-Grade ECG Tests on Smartphone

Spandan ECG offers advanced medical-grade ECG tests on your smartphone. Detect blockages, arrhythmias, take real-time ECG and Hyperkalemia test, and check stress and anxiety levels

  • 12 Lead ECG
  • Lead ll ECG
  • HRV
  • Hyperkalemia
  • Live Monitor

12 Lead ECG

The Spandan Portable ECG device uses no battery and derives power from the mobile it is connected to. No internet is required for our ECG app for smartphones, either.
Learn More
Sample Report

Lead II ECG

Detect and measure the rhythm of the heart. This test is primarily used to diagnose various patterns of arrhythmia.

Learn More
Sample Report

HRV

The Heart Rate Variability test interprets the variation in heart rate. It also allows you to track your stress and anxiety levels.

Learn More
Sample Report

Hyperkalemia

This test aids in the detection of hyperkalemia, a medical condition characterized by elevated levels of potassium in the blood.

Learn More
Sample Report

Live Monitor

Monitor your heart health in real-time. Gain valuable information about the rhythm, rate, and overall cardiac health of your heart.

Learn More

Reviews and Testimonials

Nice product and very good service and support! Results are also good. Easy to use and no need for technical information to operate. All team members are well mannered and supportive. Highly recommended for day to day life and must have product for each and every home.

I have used this ecg machine for over 100 patients. The reports are credible. Those diagnosed by the ecg as abnormal are followed up by me with 2 D echo and stress test and moostly found correct. Most of the tests done were for charity.

Frequently Asked Questions

I am looking for an ECG machine for clinic. Is Sunfox Spandan Pro suitable?

Sunfox Spandan Pro is a portable ECG device specially designed for cardiologists, general practitioners, and other healthcare professionals. It is a multichannel ECG with 10 leads, features Goldberger ECG system and auto-switching leads.

What’s the difference between Sunfox Spandan Pro, Spandan Neo, and Spandan Legacy?

Spandan Pro is crafted for doctors, featuring 10 leads that enable quick ECG readings. Spandan Neo, tailored for non-experts, is ideal for home monitoring. And, Spandan Legacy, our first flagship product is suitable for both experts and non-experts.

How many leads does it have?

Sunfox Spandan Pro is a multichannel ECG machine, featuring 10 leads that easily conduct a 12-Lead ECG test. With access to the Goldberger ECG system, its user-friendly mechanism allows doctors to seamlessly navigate and interpret cardiac data.

Does it offer 12 Lead ECG?

Yes! Sunfox Spandan Pro offers a 12-Lead ECG on smartphones using just 10 leads, ensuring a 99.7% accuracy. With sharp sensitivity, it detects slight heart irregularities and minute ECG variations, providing clear traces that can be zoomed in 50X.

Take the First Step Towards a Healthy Heart

*Spandan is currently available for Android Users only.
